--
> I put 50 druids on ground, surrounded the area with 3-4 tiles high 
of 
> water and then created a pretty good area just so I could take on 
the 
> faeries.  Sounds like a good idea, right?  Wrong.  The damn druids 
> basically covered their entire spot with trees and their protective 
> spells so much that it slowed the game down.  I might try again with 
> druids that have just enough experience to summon faeries, but not 
do 
> anything else besides creating faeries.

Originally, I had experience level 30 druids.  The concept works a lot 
better with experience level 9 druids.  It was kind of fun taking out 
250 faeries with one bomb.
